Sudden Bolt.name: Sudden Bolt
Sudden Bolt.flavor: From the edge of sight, your well-placed bolt knocks your enemy silly.
Sudden Bolt.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow.
Sudden Bolt.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If you are hidden from the target when you make this attack, the target is dazed until the end of your turn.

Unseen Shot.name: Unseen Shot
Unseen Shot.flavor: They saw your attack but have no idea where it came from.
Unseen Shot.trigger: You miss with a ranged attack while hidden
Unseen Shot.effect: You remain hidden if you have any cover or concealment. You can also shift 1 square.

Bolt from Nowhere.name: Bolt from Nowhere
Bolt from Nowhere.flavor: Your bolt sails across the battlefield and sends your enemies into a panic.
Bolt from Nowhere.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow.
Bolt from Nowhere.effect: Make a secondary attack, which has the fear keyword.
Bolt from Nowhere.secondaryTarget: The primary target and each enemy you can see within 3 squares of it
